description:
Established in 2011 in Little Rock, Arkansas, the law firm of Reddick Moss has an additional office in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, from which we provide invaluable counsel and support to clients across our region who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one as the result of any of the following:

  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Medical and hospital negligence
  • Car, tractor-trailer, motorcycle and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Defective products
  • Unsafe property conditions

Along with our Little Rock and Philadelphia locations, our law firm has law offices in Denver, Colorado, and Santa Fe, New Mexico. This growth lends credence to the level of success we have achieved fighting on behalf of the rights and entitlements of our plaintiff clients. As evidence of this, we have recovered more than $500 million in total compensation for those we have served.

Recognized as among the top trial lawyers in the nation, our attorneys have earned numerous top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including AV Preeminent peer-review ratings* through Martindale-Hubbell. We have also become members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums, and our lawyers have received dozens of testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

For more information on how we can best serve your needs and help you obtain the justice you deserve, you can contact Reddick Moss to schedule a free evaluation of your claim.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary.

Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
